entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oakville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 10:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.6°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
